message.content:
cs.IT, cs.CR, cs.DS, cs.DB, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with the problem of private function retrieval (PFR) in a distributed storage system, which involves retrieving a linear combination of messages stored in non-colluding MDS coded databases while revealing no information about the coefficients of the intended linear combination to any of the individual databases. This problem is related to information theory (cs.IT), cryptography (cs.CR), distributed systems (cs.DS), databases (cs.DB), and coding theory (cs.CC). Therefore, these are the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper.
